name: Redeal Solitaire
description:
Redeal is a compendium of 50 solitaire games presented using superb 3-dimensional graphics and realistic card motion.

Use/take your own photos for the table, the background or the card backs!

Play against your friends with the same shuffle of cards, using barcode scanning and sharing unique deal seeds!

Try and beat your highest score in any of 42 popular Solitaire types totalling 50 variants:

Aces Up
Baker's Dozen
Black Hole
Bowling
Calculation
Canfield
The Carpet
Clock
Crescent
Cruel
Doubles
Easthaven
Eight Off
Fortress
Fortune
Forty Thieves
Fourteen Out
FreeCell
Gaps
Golf
Good Measure
House Of Commons
Half Klondike
Klondike
Double Klondike
La Belle Lucie
Martha
Monte Carlo 13s
Nestor
Poker Solitaire
Pyramid
Rail
Scorpion
Simple Simon
Six By Six
Spider
Thieves
Three Blind Mice
Tri Peaks
Westcliff
Windmill
Yukon

Uses an intuitive control system designed specifically for touch screen devices - drag or tap cards to move them from place to place. Supports Mouse on devices.

Features optional sound effects / music and intelligent camera motion to automatically present the perfect view of the cards.

Carefully optimised native application for Tablets and Phones.

We recommend a screen size of at least 3.5", but some of the solitaire variants are best experienced on a larger screen.
